trans-unit.source: Supports methods that can be called when a COM component starts up or shuts down.
trans-unit.target: Støtter metoder kan kalles når en COM-komponent starter opp eller avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IProcessInitializer interface methods on serviced components if you want to run initialization or shutdown code when a server process (Dllhost.exe) starts up or shuts down, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Implementere IProcessInitializer grensesnittet metodene for fikk service komponenter Hvis du vil kjøre initialisering eller avslutning kode når en serverprosess (Dllhost.exe) starter opp eller avsluttes, henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: COM+ provides `Startup` and `Shutdown` events when Dllhost.exe starts and ends.
trans-unit.target: COM + gir `Startup` og `Shutdown` hendelser når Dllhost.exe starter og slutter.

trans-unit.source: This feature enables any COM+ components that are installed in a COM+ server application (referred to as server components hereafter) to run custom initialization and clean up code.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen aktiverer en COM +-komponenter som er installert i en COM +-serverprogrammet (kalt serverkomponenter heretter) for å kjøre egendefinerte initialisering og rydde opp i koden.

trans-unit.source: An instance of each component that implements the IProcessInitializer interface will be created and stored for the duration of the process, and called on the interface methods during startup and shutdown.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av hver komponent som implementerer grensesnittet IProcessInitializer blir opprettet og lagret i løpet av prosessen, og kall til metodene grensesnittet under oppstart og avslutning.

trans-unit.source: When implemented on a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>, during registration of the component, the `InitializesServerApplication` parameter in the `COMAdminCatalogObject` within the Components collection is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert på en <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>, under registrering av komponenten i `InitializesServerApplication` parameter i den `COMAdminCatalogObject` i komponentene samlingen er satt til `true`.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent>

trans-unit.source: Using the `Startup` and `Shutdown` events, you can initialize resources, create connections, initialize shared data, and run cleanup code.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den `Startup` og `Shutdown` hendelser, initialisere ressurser, kan opprette koblinger, initialisere delte data og kjøre oppryddingskode.

trans-unit.source: However, you must not access states that are specific to COM+ because instances of server components have not yet been created.
trans-unit.target: Du må imidlertid ikke tilgang til statusene som er spesifikke for COM + fordi forekomster av serverkomponenter ikke har blitt opprettet.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code in the `Startup` and `Shutdown` events should return as quickly as possible, because the system waits only 90 seconds for Dllhost.exe to prepare to accept activations after the system starts the process.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg koden i den `Startup` og `Shutdown` hendelser skal returnere så snart som mulig, fordi systemet venter 90 sekunder for Dllhost.exe kunne godta aktiveringer etter at systemet har startet prosessen.

trans-unit.source: If Dllhost.exe does not signal that it is ready within 90 seconds, the system ends the process; thus, all initialization processing needs to be completed within this time frame.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Dllhost.exe ikke signalisere at den er klar i 90 sekunder, avsluttes systemet prosessen. derfor alle initialisering behandling må fylles ut i dette tidsrommet.

trans-unit.source: Each server component that participates in initialization must support the IProcessInitializer interface.
trans-unit.target: Hver serverkomponenten som deltar i initialisering må støtte grensesnittet IProcessInitializer.

trans-unit.source: On DllHost.exe startup, COM+ creates all server components that requested this service, calls `QueryInterface` for the IProcessInitializer interface, and calls the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitializer.Startup%2A> function.
trans-unit.target: Ved oppstart av DllHost.exe, COM + oppretter alle serverkomponenter bedt om denne tjenesten, kall `QueryInterface` for IProcessInitializer grensesnittet og kall av <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitializer.Startup%2A>funksjonen.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitializer.Startup%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when the DllHost.exe process is shut down, it calls the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitializer.Shutdown%2A> function on those previously stored interface pointers.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte når prosessen DllHost.exe avsluttes, kaller den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitializer.Shutdown%2A>funksjonen på de tidligere lagret grensesnittpekere.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitializer.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performs shutdown actions.
trans-unit.target: Utfører avsluttet handlinger.

trans-unit.source: Called when Dllhost.exe is shut down.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når Dllhost.exe avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: Shutdown is not called during a failfast or other catastrophic shutdown events.
trans-unit.target: Stopp kalles ikke under en failfast eller andre alvorlig avslutninger.

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization at startup.
trans-unit.target: Utfører initialisering ved oppstart.

trans-unit.source: Called when Dllhost.exe is started.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når Dllhost.exe er startet.

trans-unit.source: The object referenced by `punkProcessControl` implements an <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som refererer til `punkProcessControl` implementerer en <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl>grensesnittet.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl> supports the single method <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl.ResetInitializerTimeout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl>støtter metoden enkelt <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl.ResetInitializerTimeout%2A>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl.ResetInitializerTimeout%2A></xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl>

trans-unit.source: The initialization code in Startup can call the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl.ResetInitializerTimeout%2A>, with the time-out set equal to the number of seconds remaining before the startup of the component times out.
trans-unit.target: Initialisering av koden i startet kan kalle den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl.ResetInitializerTimeout%2A>, med tidsavbrudd satt til antall sekunder gjenstår før oppstart av komponenten tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IProcessInitControl.ResetInitializerTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: In Microsoft Windows XP, a pointer to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IUnknown" name="IUnknown" href=""></xref> interface of the COM component starting up.
trans-unit.target: I Microsoft Windows XP, en peker til den <xref uid="langword_csharp_IUnknown" name="IUnknown" href=""> </xref> grensesnitt for COM-komponent starter.

trans-unit.source: In Microsoft Windows 2000, this argument is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: I Microsoft Windows 2000 dette argumentet er alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
